entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is introduced as the person who takes Moody's seat at the table.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as sitting down opposite Fred and being impressed by Moody.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is introduced as the twins' best friend who is also impressed by Moody.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as being cool and having a lesson with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking about Moody's lesson and being eager to learn more.

relationships.description: Fred Weasley admires Moody, calling him 'cool'.
George is also impressed by Moody and calls him 'supercool'.
Lee Jordan agrees with Fred and George that Moody is cool.
Harry is interested in learning more about Moody's lesson.
